hero.title: Build together a
hero.lead: RealToken DAO is a decentralized ecosystem that integrates all your real-world asset tokens such as real estate, factoring, or debt, by collaborating with different partners to decentralize the management of real-world assets.

about.title: Real asset tokenization: liquidity, exchange, available, accessible.
about.description: RealToken DAO transforms real estate investment by making real assets accessible, tradable and available 24/7. Each token represents a verifiable share of a premium real estate portfolio, with instant liquidity and decentralized governance.

liquidity.title: Liquidity
liquidity.description: Access tokenized real estate assets tradable 24/7 on decentralized markets.

exchange.title: Exchange
exchange.description: Trade your RealToken tokens transparently and securely on the ecosystem.

available.title: Available
available.description: Real assets accessible to all, fractionalized into verifiable digital shares.

accessible.title: Accessible
accessible.description: Invest in premium real estate without traditional barriers or intermediaries.

rmm.title: RMM
rmm.description: RealToken Market Maker - Liquidity and exchange platform for RealToken tokens, facilitating transactions and price discovery.

yam.title: YAM
yam.description: Your Asset Manager - Management interface to track your tokenized assets, visualize returns and manage your RealToken portfolio.

ressources.title: Documentation and guides for the ecosystem.

wiki.title: Wiki
wiki.description: Complete documentation on the RealToken ecosystem, protocols, governance and usage guides.

protocol.title: Decentralized protocol
protocol.description: Transparent community governance where every REG holder can participate in important decisions.

forum.title: Forum
forum.description: Discussion and proposal space for the RealToken DAO community.

tally.title: Tally
tally.description: On-chain voting platform for governance proposals and DAO decisions.

process.title: Join the RealToken ecosystem in three steps.

step1.title: Buy tokens from a partner
step1.text: Acquire your RealToken tokens from our certified partners and join the ecosystem.

step2.title: Tokens available in the ecosystem (RMM, YAM)
step2.text: Your tokens are immediately available on RMM for trading and YAM for portfolio management.

step3.title: Get a REG token and participate in governance
step3.text: Receive your REG tokens to actively participate in decentralized governance. Coming soon: NFTs to improve decentralized governance.

cta.title: Integrate your token and shape the future of the RealToken ecosystem.
cta.description: Join the RealToken ecosystem as a partner. Integrate your tokens and benefit from the liquidity, governance and DAO infrastructure to develop your project.
